meanings.definition: To surpass in manliness or courage.
meanings.sent1: He overmans his fear and bravely faces the challenge.
meanings.sent2: She always overmans any obstacles that come her way.
meanings.sent3: The knight overmans the dragon in the story.
meanings.sent4: His determination overmans any doubts that may arise.
meanings.sent5: The hero's courage overmans all odds in the tale.

meanings.sent1: The dictator tries to overmans the entire population.
meanings.sent2: The boss tends to overmans his employees with strict rules.
meanings.sent3: The villain's plan to overmans the city is foiled by the hero.
meanings.sent4: The powerful king overmans the neighboring kingdoms.
meanings.sent5: The evil sorcerer's magic overmans the will of the people.

meanings.definition: A person who surpasses others in manliness or courage.
meanings.sent1: He is known as the overmans of the group for his bravery.
meanings.sent2: The overmans of the team always leads by example.
meanings.sent3: The overmans of the village is always ready to help others.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the overmans saves the day with his courage.
meanings.sent5: The overmans of the tribe is respected by all for his strength.
